title: Research highlights true impacts of plastics on our planet ... - UNEP
body: Nairobi, 11 March, 2019 - The global fight against plastic pollution comes into sharp focus at the Fourth UN Environment Assembly this month in Nairobi, Kenya, with the launch of three reports each addressing different aspects of, and solutions for, the growing impact of plastics on the world's marine environments. The report, Plastics and Shallow Water Coral Reefs, spotlights the current ...
